Tell the most incredibly stupid fake things about Canadians.
i thought it was adding games to your wishlist.

>> i thought it was adding games to your wishlist. 
And that, I just added a dozen or so, I now have about 470-480, but there are no more good games to add, so it will probably end until new games are added to Steam.
PFFT there's no such thing as a bearjew

>> PFFT there's no such thing as a bearjew 
Inglorious Bastards

>> PFFT there's no such thing as a bearjew 

What about a JewBearPig?

>> MANBEARPIG MUST BE STOPPED!!!!!

 http://www.theluxuryspot.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/05/tumblr_l1z35ptv9W1qacl7t.jpg  

Is the ManBearPig  jewish ? If so, we must stop this monstrosity at all costs.
